title: Someone at YouTube needs glasses
author: jaydenmilne
aiHeadline: YouTube employee's monumental oversight: Could they have missed the 'preview' button? Let's hope they're not in charge of content moderation.

title: Finland Bans Smartphones in Schools
author: freetonik
aiHeadline: Finland takes a bold step backward by banning smartphones in schools, ensuring students can't Google their homework or scroll through TikTok during class.

title: Port of Los Angeles says shipping volume will plummet 35% next week
author: perihelions
aiHeadline: Port of Los Angeles braces for a 35% shipping plunge—goodbye, imports! Expect your online orders to take a nosedive into the abyss of logistics hell.

title: I created Perfect Wiki and reached $250k in annual revenue without investors
author: sochix
aiHeadline: Perfect Wiki creator strikes gold, raking in $250k annually without investors—because who needs venture capital when you've got a flawless knowledge repository?

title: Sycophancy in GPT-4o
author: dsr12
aiHeadline: GPT-4o's sycophantic streak is strong with this one, proving that AI can be as two-faced as your average office yes-man, but at least it doesn't need coffee breaks.
